name: MIS Individual Prisoner Earnings and Activities
description:
Report displays Prisoners and their earning and activities for a date range specified at run time.
FIN0093- v00.00.01 Date Modified 05/02/2019

dataset.name: Earnings
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT * AS BUSINESS_DATE_ FROM (SELECT DISTINCT AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('A_EARN', 'EARN', 'UPAY', 'RUPAY', 'EARS') AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('A_EARN', 'EARN', 'UPAY', 'RUPAY', 'EARS') AND AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A6206EG' AND AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-12-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('10-12-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) GROUP BY AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) _query0 FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SUM(CASE WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'CR' THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT WHEN AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE = 'DR' THEN -AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT END) FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK = AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A6206EG' AND AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-12-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('10-12-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) GROUP BY AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK THEN AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME ELSE TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME) - 1 / 86400 END, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_CODE, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID, COALESCE(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID, 'Not Recorded')), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) _query1 ON _query0.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = _query1.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE_, 'TBD' AS V_BALANCE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Attendance
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.CODE, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A6206EG' AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-12-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('10-12-2020 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT START_TIME, CODE, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, STATUS, COMMENT_TEXT, DESCRIPTION, SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Balances
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number:','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Start Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_NAME), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ACCOUNT_NAME, SUM_OF_ACCOUNT_OPENING_BALANCE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_BALANCE
field.legacySql: =[Sum of Account Opening-Balance]+RunningSum([Transaction Amount CR/DR];FORCE_COL;([NOMS Number];[Account Name]))
